import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import { handleInitialData } from '../actions/shared' import LoadingBar from 'react-redux-loading' import Auth from './Auth' import Dashboard from './Dashboard' import NewQuestion from './NewQuestion' import Leaderboard from './Leaderboard' import QuestionPage from './QuestionPage' import ErrorPage from './ErrorPage' import { INVALID_ID, INVALID_PAGE } from '../utils/' class App extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.dispatch(handleInitialData()) } render() { console.log(this.props.questions) console.log(this.props.users) return (
{this.props.loading === true ? () : }
) } } function mapStateToProps({ authedUser, questions, users }) { return { loading: authedUser === null, authedUser, questions, users } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(App)
